name: Expert Finder
author: Konnektiv

sections.description:
This Plugin provides a search engine to find experts who created or commented various WordPress content types. Experts are found using a sophisticated algorithm evaluating the social interaction. Its parameters can be configured on the plugin settings page. The search engine can be included anywhere on the site using the [expert_finder] shortcode.

This plugin was originally developed for the globe – Community of Digital Learning on behalf of GIZ.

Contact

  • Konnektiv
  • Expert Finder on GitHub – Report issues, contribute code
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘expert-finder’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: A search engine to find experts who created or commented various WordPress content types.
